description: This Irish beef stew is simple but delicious comfort food, delicious served with crusty bread.
name: Irish Beef Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 large carrots, peeled and chopped into chunks
1L beef stock, hot, made with 2 stock cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Heat half of the oil in a large, deep casserole and cook the beef in batches for 2 minutes on each side to brown. Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Add the remaining oil, onions, carrots and celery to the casserole and cook for 5-6 minutes. Add the beef back into the pan with its juices and stir in the tomato puree.
Add the beef stock and potatoes and bring to the boil. Cover with the lid and cook for 1 hour in the oven.
Remove the lid and cook uncovered for 20 minutes to reduce the sauce. Stir in fresh parsley and serve.
